title: Hope for the Emotionally Broken
itunes:author: Guests: Dave & Kirsten Samuel
itunes:summary:
When your mate has suffered past abuse, it might take years or even decades for him or her to heal. The process can be very difficult and full of twists and turns. John, Greg and Erin share how to walk with your spouse, even when he or she is recovering from a traumatic experience. Featuring David and Kirsten Samuel.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Kirsten Samuel's book "Choosing a Way Out" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-11-23?refcd=1328305

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/hope-for-the-emotionally-broken/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/loving-your-spouse-through-the-seasons-of-marriage-digital?refcd=1314706

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
